name: A little Spaceshooter
description:
A little Spaceshooter

This is my first game a little Spaceshooter. Nothing special, but still entertaining. Feel the nostalgic touch of a top-down shooter with a retro like graphic, while fighting with your friends and strangers for the best spots at the scoreboard. Give it a try it is completely free and a game takes no longer then 15 minutes.

Features:
- 20 types of enemy's
- randomized shop system
- randomized spawner
- leader-board support
- epic boss battle
- 3 weapon's for your ship
- modifiable laser colours
- achievements

A game made by Daragon-Games.

To play use WSAD and the mouse.
